definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: It is also a fundamental tool for the rule laying down policy and law .
sentences.chinese: 它是統治者制定政策與法律的立腳點。

sentences.english: Local rulers were too weak to extirpate them.
sentences.chinese: 當地的統治者力量太弱，無法根除他們。

sentences.english: Unique combination of real time strategy with turn-based strategy, wonderful graphic, exciting gameplay allow you to feel yourself a real world ruler.
sentences.chinese: 令人激動的遊戲讓你認爲自己是一個現實世界統治者。

sentences.english: He also began to carry it out as soon as he took charge of FengXi warlord.
sentences.chinese: 在掌控奉系軍閥統治權後，他也開始踐行這一思想。

sentences.english: The new nation needs a modern-minded ruler.
sentences.chinese: 這個新興的國家需要有現代頭腦之統治者。

sentences.english: Therefore many officials were killed in his ruling period.
sentences.chinese: 他統治時期法律嚴酷，造成了人人自危的恐怖統治。

sentences.english: Therefore many officials were killed in his ruling period.
sentences.chinese: 他統治時期法律嚴酷，造成了人人自危的恐怖統治。

sentences.english: Graphics on screen The Kingdom will return to Jerusalem and It will be ruled over by a marvellous King.
sentences.chinese: 神的國將回到耶路撒冷，由一位了不起的王作統治。

sentences.english: He appointed his son, Senwesret I, as co-ruler.
sentences.chinese: 他還任命兒子賽恩沃斯里特一世爲共同統治者。

sentences.english: Rulers in Beijing are belatedly trying to befriend his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 北京的統治者們才亡羊補牢的費心思去親近他的敵人。

sentences.english: Among the whites in the United States it is only the reactionary ruling circles who oppress the black people.
sentences.chinese: 在美國壓迫黑人的，只是白色人種中的反動統治集團。

sentences.english: Military strongmen have ruled Egypt since 1952.
sentences.chinese: 從1952年起，軍事強人就統治埃及。

sentences.english: Its obligation must be to serve the people, not rule over them.
sentences.chinese: 它的責任必須確保政府是服務於我們而非統治我們。

sentences.english: How many Elemental Dragons guide and rule Ashan?
sentences.chinese: 一共有多少條元素龍統治和操縱着亞山年夜陸？

sentences.english: How do the Internet and the ICT revolution affect governance?
sentences.chinese: 因特網和ICT革命怎麼影響統治？

sentences.english: America was a country of the white-dominated society.
sentences.chinese: 美國曾是白人統治的世界。

definition: to be destroyed/to become extinct/to perish/to die out/to destroy/to exterminate
to separate oneself from/to break away from/diastasis (medicine)/abscission/abjunction (botany)
